attributes.action: Mean girls, bratz the movie and Hannah Montana  should be put on to Netflix
attributes.background: These films are only a few of many SICKK films in most childhoods and now you can barely find them. Can’t let the next generation miss out on these so let’s give the films the credit they deserve! If you agree and love these films then SIGN UP HUNSSSSSS

rejection.details:
The UK Parliament and Government are not responsible for Netflix content.

You could contact Netflix to make this suggestion.
